PreviewFrame - Class in uk.co.silentsoftware.ui
Frame to display many preview results This frame has a fixed width and height that is 4 Spectrum images across by 4 in height to cater for all 16 dither strategies currently available.

Dither preview frame that locks the resize to the fixed dimensions required for all 15 dithers
